description: This figure illustrates the global distribution of Monoplex nicobaricus (Röding, 1798), based on 4,245 georeferenced occurrence records compiled from GBIF, OBIS an iNaturalist. The species exhibits a broad Indo-Pacific distribution extending into the tropical Atlantic, with verified records from the Canary Islands. Occurrence data were standardized, quality-checked, and integrated into a Geographic Information System (GIS) framework, with spatial analyses and map production produced in Mapbox Studio. The figure forms part of the manuscript “Monoplex nicobaricus (Röding, 1798) in the Canary Islands: A Comprehensive Study of Morphology, Ecology, and Behavior” and is presented here as a stand-alone supplementary reference.
keywords: Monoplex nicobaricus, cymatiidae, Biogeography, Global Distribution, Gis digital format, Gis digital technique, Gis digital system, Occurrence data
